about_the_game:
Do you like boobs?　--OK, congratulations. You have the opportunity to prove it.

123 pairs of boobs standing in the way.

  • Underwear, swimwear, kimono, fantasy, etc. Find out what's inside, full of personality!
  • Quickly find and click on the clothed boobs from the bare boobs shown.
  • Let's achieve quotas and open episodes!

Rubbing and squeezing. 6 selected boob episodes.

Episodes are in the style of a visual novel with full female voices.
It contains six boob episodes carefully selected and refined from a group of previously released works.
  • Episode1.
    What kind of fascinating massage did the players request from their volleyball coach?
  • Episode2.
    I had gained magical powers and decided to play a prank on a senior with big tits.
  • Episode3.
    Infiltration failure! What is the fate of the captured warrior's sunken nipples?
  • Episode4.
    I want to take breast augmentation supplements and make him sorry. I was thinking...
  • Episode5.
    A photo session alone with two people. But on the other side of the video camera......
  • Episode6.
    I can't concentrate on work because of her too big boobs. I'll be brave enough to ask.

Difficult?　All you need is a love for boobs.

Boobs don't wait forever. But let's try again and again, learning boobs in practice mode.
If that's not enough, hit a high grade in Dojo mode and show the world your love of boobs!

*All characters in the film are 18 years of age or older.

name: BooBsxBooBs

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows8
  • Processor: 1.6GHz and above
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct X Compatible
  • Additional Notes: Mouse device required
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows8
  • Processor: 1.6GHz and above
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct X Compatible
  • Additional Notes: Mouse device required

short_description: Do you love boobs?　A memory & seek game that will test your love of boobs.
supported_languages:
English, Japanese*, Russian, Portuguese - Brazil
*languages with full audio support
